Detailed Description

Class for controlling a formation of multiple mobile robots.

Objects of this class contain the following ros parameter:

Ros-Parameter Description
~target/input_typeType of the target state topic.
~current/input_typeType of the current state topic.
~rate Rate the controller is spinning with.
~topic_output Name of the output topic.

◆ calcControl()

virtual ControlVector Controller::calcControl ( State  current_state,
State  target_state 
)
protectedpure virtual

Control law fucntion. Determines the control vector by a given current and target state. Is implemented in derived Classes.

Parameters
current_stateCurrent state of the controlled robot.
target_stateState of the mobile robot to be reached.
Returns
ControlVector Commands to gain the target state from current state

Implemented in LyapunovController, and PassTroughController.
